Material used.Description: Used to observe structural changes in fibrils.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutation showed distinct morphological differences in fibril formation.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard morphological features observed in controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant deviation from control fibril morphology.

Material used.Description: Used to separate fibril aggregates from solution.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutation showed increased sedimentation rates compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard sedimentation rates observed in controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Sedimentation rates outside ±15% of control values.

Material used.Description: Used to detect epitope-specific antibody binding.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutation showed reduced antibody binding to specific epitopes.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding intensity reduced by ≥30% compared to controls.
